price: Quienes crean y no desacrediten su fe cometiendo la injusticia de asociar divinidades a Dios, estarán a salvo, porque son los bien guiados.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَلَمۡ يَلۡبِسُوٓاْ إِيمَٰنَهُم بِظُلۡمٍ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمُ ٱلۡأَمۡنُ وَهُم مُّهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna āmanū walam yalbisū īmānahum biẓul'min ulāika lahumu al-amnu wahum muh'tadūna
